SuperstitioMod:JokeDescription.NAME: Five Signs of Decline - Minor
DESCRIPTIONS: You've undergone the Minor Five Signs of Decline. Your once-divine body now bears flaws, bringing you closer to mere mortality. NL The signs you've experienced: NL #ysuperstitiomod:Muted Melody, #ysuperstitiomod:Dimming Aura, #ysuperstitiomod:Wet and Wild, #ysuperstitiomod:Uncertain Foresight, #ysuperstitiomod:Reluctant Awakening.
SuperstitioMod:JokeDescription.FLAVOR: Dev note: I hope you’ve realized—this relic does absolutely nothing.

SuperstitioMod:SorM.NAME: S or M Mode
DESCRIPTIONS: Masochist: For every #b%d damage taken, gain %d point(s) of #ysuperstitiomod:Pleasure. NL Sadist: When you deal more than #b%d damage, gain %d point(s) of #ysuperstitiomod:Pleasure. NL Right-click outside combat to switch mode.
Currently in Masochist mode. NL For every #b%d damage taken, gain %d point(s) of #ysuperstitiomod:Pleasure. NL Right-click outside combat to switch to Sadist mode.
Currently in Sadist mode. NL When you deal more than #b%d damage, gain %d point(s) of #ysuperstitiomod:Pleasure. NL Right-click outside combat to switch to Masochist mode.
Currently in Dual mode. NL For every #b%d damage taken, gain %d point(s) of #ysuperstitiomod:Pleasure. NL When you deal more than #b%d damage, gain %d point(s) of #ysuperstitiomod:Pleasure.
SuperstitioMod:SorM.FLAVOR: Why choose? I like it both ways—ah! Ah! AHx99!

SuperstitioMod:NippleRings.NAME: Nipple Rings
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you reach a #ysuperstitiomod:Orgasm, gain %d temporary Strength.
SuperstitioMod:NippleRings.FLAVOR: They make you extra tempting—especially when those nipples perk up.

SuperstitioMod:Prostitution.NAME: Prostitution
DESCRIPTIONS: For every %d times you play a #yPenetration or a #yService #ySex card, gain %d gold.

SuperstitioMod:EjaculationMaster.NAME: Squirting Master
DESCRIPTIONS: This battle: Every time you trigger #ysuperstitiomod:Squirt %d times, draw %d card(s).
SuperstitioMod:EjaculationMaster.FLAVOR: Look how far I can shoot!

SuperstitioMod:CumOnShoes.NAME: Cum-Stained Heels
DESCRIPTIONS: This battle: For every %d #ySex card(s) you play, gain 1 stack of Agility.
